Text: 視卒如嬰兒，故可以與之赴深。\\n\\n這些士兵侍奉孫武傳人，甘心追隨他們踏上征程，無懼死亡。手持輕戟，身穿中甲，這些士兵能夠應對各種情勢，同樣熟練地對抗騎兵或步兵。他們的多種能力使他們深受將領器重，稱其爲“解煩”，而他們則以忠誠報答。
English: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.
MappedByText: 視卒如嬰兒，故可以與之赴深。\\n\\n這些士兵侍奉孫武傳人，甘心追隨他們踏上征程，無懼死亡。手持輕戟，身穿中甲，這些士兵能夠應對各種情勢，同樣熟練地對抗騎兵或步兵。他們的多種能力使他們深受將領器重，稱其爲“解煩”，而他們則以忠誠報答。
Iascus: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.

Text: 八才戟衛是劉表屬下武技卓越的楷模，揮戟之技無人能及。只有忠誠且善戰者才能入選，這些衛兵的任務是保衛荊州，手持長戟，築成堅不可摧之防線，抵禦任何敢挑戰他們主公權威的人。他們的訓練不僅強調武藝，亦會培養忠勇的信念。這使他們在戰場上成為一支可怕的力量。
English: The Ji Guards of the Eight Talents stand as paragons of martial prowess within Liu Bao's domain, wielding the Ji with unmatched skill. Selected for their loyalty and combat mastery, these guards are tasked with the defense of Jing province, utilizing their polearms to form an impregnable line against any who dare challenge their lord's authority. Their training emphasizes not just the art of the Ji but the values of courage and fidelity, making them a formidable force on the battlefield.
MappedByText: 八才戟衛是劉表屬下武技卓越的楷模，揮戟之技無人能及。只有忠誠且善戰者才能入選，這些衛兵的任務是保衛荊州，手持長戟，築成堅不可摧之防線，抵禦任何敢挑戰他們主公權威的人。他們的訓練不僅強調武藝，亦會培養忠勇的信念。這使他們在戰場上成為一支可怕的力量。

Text: 北海的建安巡守弓手是該地防禦戰略中不可或缺的一環，以弓箭構築防線，阻擋敵軍前進。他們經過協同訓練，齊射的箭雨更加致命，既可阻止敵軍衝鋒，亦可保護險要。他們使用的松香箭獨具特色，比傳統箭矢更具優勢，箭雨可以化為烈焰，一旦命中目標即可使大火在敵陣中蔓延。
English: Beihai's Jianan Vigilante Archers form a crucial part of the province's defensive strategy, using their bows to create a lethal barrier against advancing foes. Trained to work in concert, their collective volleys become more deadly as they stand shoulder to shoulder, their precision and rapid fire rate designed to halt enemy charges and protect key positions. They stand apart for their use of rosin arrows, a deadly innovation that sets their volleys ablaze with destructive fire. These specialized projectiles offer a significant advantage over traditional arrows, igniting upon impact to spread flames among enemy ranks.
MappedByText: 北海的建安巡守弓手是該地防禦戰略中不可或缺的一環，以弓箭構築防線，阻擋敵軍前進。他們經過協同訓練，齊射的箭雨更加致命，既可阻止敵軍衝鋒，亦可保護險要。他們使用的松香箭獨具特色，比傳統箭矢更具優勢，箭雨可以化為烈焰，一旦命中目標即可使大火在敵陣中蔓延。

Text: 北海的建安巡守弩兵是抵禦侵略的堡壘，他們的弩弓來自於此地工匠的才華。他們能夠精確瞄準，使用穿透力強的弩箭，這使他們在敵人來襲之時不可或缺。如果布置得當，他們的齊射可以阻擋任何人的前進。北海防禦能力正是依賴這支堅定的力量。
English: The Jianan Vigilante Crossbowmen of Beihai stand as bulwarks against aggression, their crossbows a testament to the ingenuity and martial acumen of the region. Their ability to aim with deadly efficiency, coupled with the penetrating power of their bolts, makes them indispensable in repelling assaults. When positioned strategically, their coordinated fire ensures that any advance is met with formidable resistance, underpinning Beihai's defensive capabilities with unwavering strength.
MappedByText: 北海的建安巡守弩兵是抵禦侵略的堡壘，他們的弩弓來自於此地工匠的才華。他們能夠精確瞄準，使用穿透力強的弩箭，這使他們在敵人來襲之時不可或缺。如果布置得當，他們的齊射可以阻擋任何人的前進。北海防禦能力正是依賴這支堅定的力量。

Text: 建安精銳巡守是北海的運動戰部隊，將弩手的致命精準與騎兵的敏捷相結合。這支精銳部隊擅長騷擾敵軍陣線，迅速發動打擊再後撤躲避反擊。他們靈活高效，是北海軍隊中的一支可怕力量，能夠援助該地的射手部隊，從遠處主導戰場。他們融合速度與遠程火力，突顯了北海在戰術上的創新。
English: The Jianan Elite Vigilante represents Beihai's mastery of mobile warfare, combining the lethal precision of crossbowmen with the agility of cavalry. This elite contingent is adept at harrying enemy lines, delivering swift strikes before evading retaliation. Their ease of use and effectiveness make them a formidable addition to Beihai's forces, capable of reinforcing the province's marksmen to dominate the battlefield from a distance. Their presence underscores Beihai's innovative approach to combat, blending speed and ranged lethality.
MappedByText: 建安精銳巡守是北海的運動戰部隊，將弩手的致命精準與騎兵的敏捷相結合。這支精銳部隊擅長騷擾敵軍陣線，迅速發動打擊再後撤躲避反擊。他們靈活高效，是北海軍隊中的一支可怕力量，能夠援助該地的射手部隊，從遠處主導戰場。他們融合速度與遠程火力，突顯了北海在戰術上的創新。

Text: 建安巡守手戟兵是北海軍隊的防禦力量，他們使用手戟和盾牌，在當地精良的弓箭手和弩手周圍形成堅固的防禦屏障。這些部隊使用靈活的手戟，擅長近身格鬥，在戰場上善於攪亂敵人的陣型，並保護戰友免受近戰攻擊。他們屬於北海的防禦體系，使該地能夠在外部壓力面前保持安全和自主。
English: The Jianan Vigilante Hand-Ji Infantry serve as the protective arm of Beihai's military, their axes and shields forming a stout barrier around the province's esteemed archers and crossbowmen. These units, wielding the versatile Hand-Ji, are adapted to close combat, where they excel in disrupting enemy formations and safeguarding their fellow soldiers from melee attackers. Their presence on the battlefield reinforces Beihai's defensive posture, allowing the province to maintain its security and autonomy in the face of external pressures.
MappedByText: 建安巡守手戟兵是北海軍隊的防禦力量，他們使用手戟和盾牌，在當地精良的弓箭手和弩手周圍形成堅固的防禦屏障。這些部隊使用靈活的手戟，擅長近身格鬥，在戰場上善於攪亂敵人的陣型，並保護戰友免受近戰攻擊。他們屬於北海的防禦體系，使該地能夠在外部壓力面前保持安全和自主。

Text: 裝備新型連弩，北海的建安巡守連弩兵可謂箭如雨下、速度無雙。雖然每支箭的穿透力不如傳統弩箭，但火力之密集足以彌補，可以對敵人持續猛烈攻擊。連弩可迅速裝填，持續射擊，對於防禦至關重要，若能保持箭雨覆蓋即可逆轉戰局。作為北海軍隊的一部分，這些部隊可以提供戰略深度和適應性，保護該地免受一切威脅。
English: Equipped with the innovative repeating crossbows, Beihai's Jianan Vigilante Repeating Crossbowmen can unleash a torrent of bolts with unmatched speed. Though each bolt may lack the penetrative force of a traditional crossbow, the sheer volume of fire compensates, creating a relentless assault on approaching enemies. Their weapons' design, allowing for quick reloading and sustained fire, proves crucial in defensive engagements where maintaining a steady output of arrows can turn the tide of battle. As part of Beihai's army, these units epitomize the strategic depth and adaptability required to safeguard the province from all threats.
MappedByText: 裝備新型連弩，北海的建安巡守連弩兵可謂箭如雨下、速度無雙。雖然每支箭的穿透力不如傳統弩箭，但火力之密集足以彌補，可以對敵人持續猛烈攻擊。連弩可迅速裝填，持續射擊，對於防禦至關重要，若能保持箭雨覆蓋即可逆轉戰局。作為北海軍隊的一部分，這些部隊可以提供戰略深度和適應性，保護該地免受一切威脅。

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n長斧令人望而生畏，尤其是在這樣一個好戰的民族手中。他們被認為是優秀的突擊步兵，輕易砍裂盾牌和盔甲，重振他們的古代王朝的榮耀。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Long axes are intimidating to behold, especially in the hand of such a warlike people. Rending shields and armor alike, they are known to be good shock infantry that echo the glory of their ancient dynasty.
MappedByText: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n長斧令人望而生畏，尤其是在這樣一個好戰的民族手中。他們被認為是優秀的突擊步兵，輕易砍裂盾牌和盔甲，重振他們的古代王朝的榮耀。

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些士兵使用長矛和盾牌，為他們的軍隊形成一道防禦屏障，抵禦騎兵衝鋒。他們的盔甲比其他大多數軍隊都輕，但這使他們更加機動：許多騎兵被突如其來的荊楚矛兵打了個措手不及！
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Wielding spear and shield, these soldiers form a defensive screen for their army against calvary charges. Their armor is lighter than most other armies, but this makes them more mobile: many horsemen have been taken off-guard by a sudden rush of Jingchu Spearmen!

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些人是熟練的弓箭手，可以靈活地移動到最有利的位置為他們的軍隊提供掩護火力。然而他們需要保護免受騎兵攻擊，因為他們只有輕護甲。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Skilled archers, these men provide covering fire for their army as they maneuver nimbly into the most advantageous positions. They should be protected from cavalry however, as they are lightly armoured.

Text: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些戰士携帶蒺藜，設下看不見的陷阱來阻礙敵人前進。任何倖存者都會很快被這些戰士的利刃處理掉。一個熟練的將軍會小心防備弓箭手：他們的盔甲很輕，沒有盾牌。
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n These warriors bring caltrops to battle, stunting any enemy advance as the foe perishes on the unseen traps. Any survivors are quickly dealt with by the blades these warriors wield. A skilled general would be wary of archers though: they are lightly armored and carry no shield.
MappedByText: 在這片土地上培養出來的士兵是楚國舊王朝的繼承人，他們有著共同的氣質：鬥志昂揚，忠貞不渝。他們是使任何軍閥或皇帝適意的戰鬥力量。\\n\\n這些戰士携帶蒺藜，設下看不見的陷阱來阻礙敵人前進。任何倖存者都會很快被這些戰士的利刃處理掉。一個熟練的將軍會小心防備弓箭手：他們的盔甲很輕，沒有盾牌。

Text: 九真擲鋋兵是士燮軍隊中至關重要的一部分，他們精通投槍，可以摧毀騎兵和象兵單位。在中國南方複雜的地形中接受訓練，他們輕鬆地穿梭於各種地形之間，不受環境的影響，這是其他單位所無法企及的。他們對投槍的熟練運用使得他們在戰場上不可或缺，能夠迅速適應並利用地形的優勢，用精準的投擲來伏擊並消滅敵方的騎兵單位。
English: The Jiuzhen Javelineers are a vital component of Shi Xie's forces, expertly wielding javelins to devastating effect against cavalry and elephant units. Trained in the challenging landscapes of southern China, they navigate the terrain with ease, unfazed by the environmental penalties that hinder other forces. Their proficiency with the javelin makes them indispensable on the battlefield, where their ability to quickly adapt and utilize the terrain to their advantage allows them to ambush and decimate enemy mounted units with precision throws.
MappedByText: 九真擲鋋兵是士燮軍隊中至關重要的一部分，他們精通投槍，可以摧毀騎兵和象兵單位。在中國南方複雜的地形中接受訓練，他們輕鬆地穿梭於各種地形之間，不受環境的影響，這是其他單位所無法企及的。他們對投槍的熟練運用使得他們在戰場上不可或缺，能夠迅速適應並利用地形的優勢，用精準的投擲來伏擊並消滅敵方的騎兵單位。

Text: 九真劫匪是士燮的精銳部隊，他們以敏捷和破壞力而聞名。在近戰中使用厚重的軍刀，並用火焰彈來妨礙敵軍移動。他們獨特的武器使他們可以進行小規模戰鬥和游擊戰，在進攻前放火來擾亂敵人陣型。和九真投槍手相同，劫匪們訓練有素，能夠在中國南方各種多樣的地形中行動自如，而入侵者則會被自然環境所阻礙。任何敢於威脅士燮領地的敵人都不可小覷這些人。
English: The Jiuzhen Raiders serve as Shi Xie's agile and disruptive force, equipped with thick sabers for close combat and flame bombs for area denial. Their unique arsenal allows them to engage in direct skirmishes and guerrilla tactics, setting fires to disorient and weaken enemy formations before closing in for the kill. Like their Javelineer counterparts, the Raiders are trained to operate effectively across the diverse terrains of southern China, their movements unimpeded by the natural obstacles that typically slow invaders, making them a formidable presence against any who threaten Shi Xie's domain.
MappedByText: 九真劫匪是士燮的精銳部隊，他們以敏捷和破壞力而聞名。在近戰中使用厚重的軍刀，並用火焰彈來妨礙敵軍移動。他們獨特的武器使他們可以進行小規模戰鬥和游擊戰，在進攻前放火來擾亂敵人陣型。和九真投槍手相同，劫匪們訓練有素，能夠在中國南方各種多樣的地形中行動自如，而入侵者則會被自然環境所阻礙。任何敢於威脅士燮領地的敵人都不可小覷這些人。

Text: 家僕弓兵是荊州士族莊園防禦的支柱。他們對弓箭的精通與對土地的熟悉相輔相成，這使他們能夠利用地形優勢來擊退威脅。這些箭手並非以武藝而被重視，而是因其便於部署，補給簡單，所以是維護領地安全的高效選擇。他們只需很少補給即可有效運作，並且善於利用當地地形保護，是不可或缺的防禦力量。
English: The House Servant Archers represent the utilitarian backbone of defense for the noble estates of Jing Province. Their proficiency with the bow is matched by their intimate knowledge of the land they patrol, allowing them to use the terrain to their advantage in warding off threats. These archers are valued not for martial prestige but for their logistical ease and strategic placement, making them an efficient choice for maintaining the security of their masters' territories. Their ability to operate effectively with minimal supply demands underscores their role as indispensable defenders, proficient in leveraging their understanding of local geography for optimal protection.
MappedByText: 家僕弓兵是荊州士族莊園防禦的支柱。他們對弓箭的精通與對土地的熟悉相輔相成，這使他們能夠利用地形優勢來擊退威脅。這些箭手並非以武藝而被重視，而是因其便於部署，補給簡單，所以是維護領地安全的高效選擇。他們只需很少補給即可有效運作，並且善於利用當地地形保護，是不可或缺的防禦力量。

Text: 家僕斧兵是荊州士族屬下務實的防禦者。他們熟悉週邊土地，善於利用地形取得優勢。這些斧兵並非備受頌揚的英雄，但卻是其主人領地防禦中不可或缺的關鍵。他們手中的單手斧頭雖然簡單，卻能有效保護領地。他們的價值在於容易補給，利用對當地地形的了解就能以最少的資源抵禦入侵者。
English: House Servant Axemen are pragmatic defenders within the service of Jing Province's noble families. Familiar with the surrounding lands and adept at utilizing their knowledge for strategic advantages, these axemen are not celebrated heroes but essential cogs in the defense of their lords' estates. Their one-handed axes, while simple, are effectively wielded to secure and protect territory. Their value lies in their efficiency and the ease with which they can be supplied, leveraging their intimate understanding of local geography to hold ground against intruders with minimal resources.
MappedByText: 家僕斧兵是荊州士族屬下務實的防禦者。他們熟悉週邊土地，善於利用地形取得優勢。這些斧兵並非備受頌揚的英雄，但卻是其主人領地防禦中不可或缺的關鍵。他們手中的單手斧頭雖然簡單，卻能有效保護領地。他們的價值在於容易補給，利用對當地地形的了解就能以最少的資源抵禦入侵者。

Text: 家僕長槍兵負責守護士族莊園，手握雙手長矛組成不可逾越的防線。他們的主要任務是守護陣地，防止騎兵突襲，以嚴整隊形和長矛有力對抗騎兵，是領地防禦中不可或缺的一環。經過訓練，他們精通長矛，即便敵軍騎兵鋪天蓋地而來，他們也能堅定抵抗。
English: House Servant Long Spearmen stand as the bulwark of noble estates' defenses, utilizing their two-handed spears with proficiency to form impenetrable lines against enemy advances. Primarily tasked with the crucial roles of holding territory and repelling cavalry charges, their disciplined formations and effective reach make them a formidable force against mounted foes. Trained to maximize the advantages of their spears, these servants are essential for maintaining the strategic integrity of the territories they guard, ensuring that even the most audacious cavalry assault is met with steadfast resistance.
MappedByText: 家僕長槍兵負責守護士族莊園，手握雙手長矛組成不可逾越的防線。他們的主要任務是守護陣地，防止騎兵突襲，以嚴整隊形和長矛有力對抗騎兵，是領地防禦中不可或缺的一環。經過訓練，他們精通長矛，即便敵軍騎兵鋪天蓋地而來，他們也能堅定抵抗。

Text: 荊州士族弓兵，沿襲世代傳承的射箭技藝。雖未經正規訓練，但在保護領地中游刃有餘，將可靠的箭術與效率相結合，在小規模防禦中起關鍵作用。他們熟悉當地地形，容易調動，是控制領土中不可或缺的力量。
English: Local Noble Archers from Jing province are skilled from tradition, excelling in local conflicts thanks to their heritage of archery practice. Not formally trained but honed through generations, they offer effective archery support in skirmishes, adept at defending their domains. Their value lies in combining reliable archery with strategic efficiency, making them crucial in small-scale defenses. Their familiarity with local terrain and cost-effective deployment further enhances their utility, marking them as essential for maintaining control in their territories.
MappedByText: 荊州士族弓兵，沿襲世代傳承的射箭技藝。雖未經正規訓練，但在保護領地中游刃有餘，將可靠的箭術與效率相結合，在小規模防禦中起關鍵作用。他們熟悉當地地形，容易調動，是控制領土中不可或缺的力量。

Text: 戰場上，民兵長斧手的出現常常令人既意外又畏懼。這些民兵部隊雖然缺乏正規的戰鬥訓練，但他們的雙手長斧具有粗犷的毀滅力量。長柄重斧既有著較長的攻擊距離，又有致命的威力，可以劈裂護甲，穿透敵陣。雖然他們的技巧不夠精湛，但武器的重量和衝擊力使得他們能夠打破敵軍陣線，造成混亂和恐懼。他們的橫掃攻擊對於密集的步兵特別有效，能夠造成最大程度的傷害。然而，他們缺乏技巧和防禦裝備，在長時間的交戰中容易受到傷害，因此在民兵部隊中屬於高風險、高回報的角色。
English: In the heat of battle, the sight of Militia Long Axemen advancing can be as daunting as it is unexpected. These militia units, though lacking in formal combat training, wield two-handed axes that bring a raw, devastating force to the fray. Their axes, characterized by long handles and heavy heads, offer both reach and a lethal impact capable of breaking through armor and ranks alike. While their technique may not be refined, the sheer weight and momentum of their weapons allow them to cleave through enemy lines, causing chaos and fear. This makes them particularly effective against tightly packed infantry, where their sweeping blows can inflict maximum damage. However, their lack of skill and defensive equipment makes them vulnerable in prolonged engagements, positioning them as a high-risk, high-reward element within any militia force.
MappedByText: 戰場上，民兵長斧手的出現常常令人既意外又畏懼。這些民兵部隊雖然缺乏正規的戰鬥訓練，但他們的雙手長斧具有粗犷的毀滅力量。長柄重斧既有著較長的攻擊距離，又有致命的威力，可以劈裂護甲，穿透敵陣。雖然他們的技巧不夠精湛，但武器的重量和衝擊力使得他們能夠打破敵軍陣線，造成混亂和恐懼。他們的橫掃攻擊對於密集的步兵特別有效，能夠造成最大程度的傷害。然而，他們缺乏技巧和防禦裝備，在長時間的交戰中容易受到傷害，因此在民兵部隊中屬於高風險、高回報的角色。

Text: 黃巾起義和迅速瓦解的漢朝，使許多人失去了家園和生計。這些人中最絕望或最不謹慎的人都變成了強盜。這些人加入黑山王的土匪，希望通過燒殺掠奪來重獲財富。儘管他們抱有希望，但他們糟糕的裝備通常讓他們只能做擋箭牌，而其他人則會因他們的犧牲而收穫回報。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the bandit of the king of Black Mountain, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.
MappedByText: 黃巾起義和迅速瓦解的漢朝，使許多人失去了家園和生計。這些人中最絕望或最不謹慎的人都變成了強盜。這些人加入黑山王的土匪，希望通過燒殺掠奪來重獲財富。儘管他們抱有希望，但他們糟糕的裝備通常讓他們只能做擋箭牌，而其他人則會因他們的犧牲而收穫回報。

Text: 天下紛亂，各地義勇蜂起，捍衛家園免受盜匪、黃巾和諸侯的侵襲。這些人久經戰陣，嫻熟於生存之道，既可近戰亦可使弓。他們積攢馬匹，使自己在戰場上能夠與更强的軍隊平起平坐。許多這樣的老兵如今歸附於諸侯旗下，可以迅速出擊應對各種情勢。
English: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.
MappedByText: 天下紛亂，各地義勇蜂起，捍衛家園免受盜匪、黃巾和諸侯的侵襲。這些人久經戰陣，嫻熟於生存之道，既可近戰亦可使弓。他們積攢馬匹，使自己在戰場上能夠與更强的軍隊平起平坐。許多這樣的老兵如今歸附於諸侯旗下，可以迅速出擊應對各種情勢。

Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.

Text: 黃巾起義和迅速瓦解的漢朝，使許多人失去了家園和生計。這些人中最絕望或最不謹慎的人都變成了強盜。這些人加入盜賊女王麾下，希望通過燒殺掠奪來重獲財富。儘管他們抱有希望，但他們糟糕的裝備通常讓他們只能做擋箭牌，而其他人則會因他們的犧牲而收穫回報。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: 白虎流浪兵乃是不願屈服於漢帝國的逃亡者的後代。他們投身於嚴白虎的旗下，希望捍衛他們的自由。身著破爛裝備，他們能做的貢獻只有他們的生命，寄希望於其他精兵來贏得戰鬥。
English: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.

Text: 草原游牧民族以優越的騎術聞名。這些騎射手轉而從事盜竊和掠奪，以填充他們的金庫。他們會歸附於一些著名的盜匪首領，索取相應份額的戰利品作為報酬。在戰鬥中，他們從遠處騷擾敵人，利用馬匹在敵方反擊時迅速離開。
English: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.
MappedByText: 草原游牧民族以優越的騎術聞名。這些騎射手轉而從事盜竊和掠奪，以填充他們的金庫。他們會歸附於一些著名的盜匪首領，索取相應份額的戰利品作為報酬。在戰鬥中，他們從遠處騷擾敵人，利用馬匹在敵方反擊時迅速離開。

They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.

Text: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n他們使用劍和盾牌，身穿重甲，能夠承受連續的箭雨，然後沖入近戰，留在那裡守住陣綫，等待其他軍隊消滅敵人。
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding sword and shield and clad in heavy armor, they can easily weather a barrage of arrows, before charging into melee and remaining there to hold the line as the rest of the army finishes the enemy.
MappedByText: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n他們使用劍和盾牌，身穿重甲，能夠承受連續的箭雨，然後沖入近戰，留在那裡守住陣綫，等待其他軍隊消滅敵人。

Text: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n這些裝甲戰士手持長矛和盾牌，沖向戰場，用他們的長矛刺穿敵人。他們只需要提防敵人的矛兵和弓弩手。
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding a long spear and shield, these armored warriors charge into battle, skewering the foe with their lances. They only need to be wary of enemy spearmen and sustained archer fire.
MappedByText: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n這些裝甲戰士手持長矛和盾牌，沖向戰場，用他們的長矛刺穿敵人。他們只需要提防敵人的矛兵和弓弩手。
Iascus: 這些騎手名聲遠揚。為了與北方部落作戰，公孫瓚打造了一支自己的騎兵部隊。這些戰士跟隨他們的領軍作戰，對抗部落或其他漢室之敵……\\n\\n這些裝甲戰士手持長矛和盾牌，沖向戰場，用他們的長矛刺穿敵人。他們只需要提防敵人的矛兵和弓弩手。
Procrastinator: 這些騎兵身披重甲，訓練有素，如一把利刃在敵陣中左衝右突。他們由一位身經百戰的伯長指揮，是戰場上的領軍者。他們的致命衝鋒足以使久戰兵鈍的友軍士氣爲之一振。 \\n\\n即便在主將缺陣的情況下，同袍們仍可放心，今日我軍並無敗北之虞。因爲這些北軍顯然已經做好準備，在這支勇猛的長戟騎兵和他們所信賴的伯長的指揮下，與敵人一決生死。

Text: 弩是一種非常有效的伏擊武器。射手只需裝上弩箭，低下身子，等待獵物到來。\\n\\n這支部隊擅長伏擊，可以瓦解那些不留心的敵人。
English: The crossbow is a very effective weapon for a surprise attack. The shooter just have to load a bolt, lower their body, and wait for the prey to come. \\n\\n This unit is adept at the tactics of smashing careless enemies with ambush shots.
MappedByText: 弩是一種非常有效的伏擊武器。射手只需裝上弩箭，低下身子，等待獵物到來。\\n\\n這支部隊擅長伏擊，可以瓦解那些不留心的敵人。

Text: 這些工匠逃離了家園，用他們的技能來保衛新家和新主公。\\n\\n陶謙從眾多湧入他領地的難民中挑選出最傑出的工匠，全力為他效力。他們從遠處用弩提供支援。當敵人接近時，他們會使用煙霧彈和鐵蒺藜。然而，這些人並非正規士兵，在近戰中無法堅守陣線。
English: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.
MappedByText: 這些工匠逃離了家園，用他們的技能來保衛新家和新主公。\\n\\n陶謙從眾多湧入他領地的難民中挑選出最傑出的工匠，全力為他效力。他們從遠處用弩提供支援。當敵人接近時，他們會使用煙霧彈和鐵蒺藜。然而，這些人並非正規士兵，在近戰中無法堅守陣線。

Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.

Text: 八才劍衛是卓越劍術的典範，誓死捍衛劉表和荊州的榮譽。這些劍衛因其出色的技能和堅定的忠誠而被挑選，以精準和優雅并且致命的技巧來舞劍。在激戰中，他們泰然自若，劍刃輕鬆穿越敵軍陣線，每一擊都在捍衛家園和守護信念。
English: The Sword Guards of the Eight Talents are the embodiment of elite swordsmanship, sworn to defend Liu Bao and the honor of Jing province. Handpicked for their exceptional skills and unwavering loyalty, these soldiers wield their swords with a precision and grace that belie their lethal efficiency. In the heat of battle, they are unflappable, their blades cutting through enemy ranks with ease, safeguarding their homeland and its ideals with every stroke.
MappedByText: 八才劍衛是卓越劍術的典範，誓死捍衛劉表和荊州的榮譽。這些劍衛因其出色的技能和堅定的忠誠而被挑選，以精準和優雅并且致命的技巧來舞劍。在激戰中，他們泰然自若，劍刃輕鬆穿越敵軍陣線，每一擊都在捍衛家園和守護信念。

Text: 盜賊女王的勢力因這些所謂的“魅影”而壯大。這些來自泰山的戰士以携帶的毒氣彈惡名遠傳。如果風向合適，毒氣可使整個軍團在交兵之前窒息。他們裝備輕劍和布甲，因此不應依賴他們在近戰中能守住陣線。
English: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.
MappedByText: 盜賊女王的勢力因這些所謂的“魅影”而壯大。這些來自泰山的戰士以携帶的毒氣彈惡名遠傳。如果風向合適，毒氣可使整個軍團在交兵之前窒息。他們裝備輕劍和布甲，因此不應依賴他們在近戰中能守住陣線。
Iascus: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.

Text: 這些女弓手源自泰山，在箭頭上塗抹了一種由該地區特有的毒草製成的特殊膏劑。在戰鬥中，這些弓手的箭雨很快會讓敵人因毒素快速傳播而窒息。明智的領軍會利用這些士兵在敵軍中播撒恐怖，但也要保護好她們：她們的射程有限，無法應對騎兵。
English: Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.
MappedByText: 這些女弓手源自泰山，在箭頭上塗抹了一種由該地區特有的毒草製成的特殊膏劑。在戰鬥中，這些弓手的箭雨很快會讓敵人因毒素快速傳播而窒息。明智的領軍會利用這些士兵在敵軍中播撒恐怖，但也要保護好她們：她們的射程有限，無法應對騎兵。

In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.

Text: 武僧是士燮在佛教流傳到中國時期培養出的獨特武力，在戰場上展現出頑強的耐力。這些戰士手握禪杖，雖不以攻擊力著稱，但在防禦方面無人能及。他們的訓練深植於佛教教義，注重耐心、堅韌，能夠吸收或格擋敵人的攻擊。這種理念使他們在戰鬥中異常耐久，可以承受那些會擊垮其他部隊的攻擊。雖然他們不會衝鋒在前，但他們可被看作能抵禦侵略的堡壘，用堅定的耐力和沉著的防禦戰術來扭轉戰局。
English: Monk Warriors, a unique martial force raised by Shi Xie amidst the embrace of Buddhism in China, stand as paragons of endurance on the battlefield. Armed with nothing but their staffs, these warriors are not known for their offensive prowess but are unrivaled in their defensive capabilities. Their training, deeply rooted in Buddhist teachings, emphasizes patience, resilience, and the ability to absorb and deflect the energy of incoming attacks. This philosophy makes them exceptionally durable in combat, capable of withstanding assaults that would overwhelm lesser troops. While they may not lead the charge, their presence is a bulwark against aggression, turning the tide of battle not through force, but through steadfast endurance and the calm application of defensive tactics.
MappedByText: 武僧是士燮在佛教流傳到中國時期培養出的獨特武力，在戰場上展現出頑強的耐力。這些戰士手握禪杖，雖不以攻擊力著稱，但在防禦方面無人能及。他們的訓練深植於佛教教義，注重耐心、堅韌，能夠吸收或格擋敵人的攻擊。這種理念使他們在戰鬥中異常耐久，可以承受那些會擊垮其他部隊的攻擊。雖然他們不會衝鋒在前，但他們可被看作能抵禦侵略的堡壘，用堅定的耐力和沉著的防禦戰術來扭轉戰局。

Text: 孫子曾言圍師必闕，以免敵軍臨危拚命。然而高順的精兵破寨軍卻認為身陷重圍也無妨，只管開殺便是。\\n\\n破寨軍以搗破敵陣的本事聞名，他們遭圍時反而更能發揮實力。哪怕沙場上屍首交疊成山，破寨軍總是能殺出重圍。
English: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.

Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些馬弓手會模仿他們經常面對的草原部落的戰術，可以熟練地邊射邊跑。他們將攻擊敵人最薄弱的地方，同時會保持距離，沒有弓弩便無法傷害他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Imitating the tactics of the tribes they often face, these horse archers are proficient hit-and-run combatants. They will strike where the enemies are weakest, while remaining out of reach of all weapons, save arrows or crossbow bolts.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵手持弓弩，向敵人發射大量穿甲箭矢。聰明的將軍會用矛兵支援他們，因為他們是敵人騎兵的主要目標。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Armed with crossbows, these soldiers rain down a hail of armour-piercing missiles on their foes. A wise general will support them with spearmen, as they are a prime target for enemy horsemen.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵會先投擲一隻備用的手戟，然後沖向敵人的防線，一隻手揮舞著他們的匕首斧，另一隻手拿著盾牌來招架敵人的回擊。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. After having thrown a spare hand-ji, these men will charge the enemy line, swinging their dagger-axes in one hand while the other holds a shield to parry retaliatory blows.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些士兵，裝備了長戟，將在騎兵衝鋒時嚴陣以待，讓馬自己衝到他們的刀刃上。他們身穿鐵甲，可以自如地加入混戰，迎擊所有來犯。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These soldiers, armed with the long Ji, will brace and hold against cavalry charges, letting the horse impale itself on their blades. Wearing iron armour, they will wade into the melee confidently and take on all comers.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n作爲敏捷的騎兵，他們可以很容易地抓住任何走散的敵人。他們的劍和盾牌將允許他們進行短暫的近戰，但之後就需要撤退。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Swift horsemen, they can easily catch any enemy left out in the open, while their swords and shields will allow them to stay in melee for a while before having to retreat.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n像這樣的老練騎兵會以毀滅性的衝鋒打散敵人，而在敵人發動反擊或放箭射他們之前他們已經撤走。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. Skilled horsemen such as these will ride the enemy down in a devastating charge and retreat before the enemy can launch a counterattack, or pepper them with arrows.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n勇敢而老練的西涼軍是大多數軍閥羡慕的對象，也是西涼軍將領的驕傲。\\n\\n這些矛兵通過先發制人的衝鋒來保護側翼，並以一定角度支起他們的羌族長矛，只有最愚蠢或最勇敢的騎兵才敢向其衝鋒。但這使他們成為遠程攻擊的目標，因此他們裝備了皮甲，並攜帶大型盾牌，以保護自己免受箭雨傷害。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These spearmen protect the flanks by pre-empting charges and bracing their qiang spears at an angle, so only the most foolish or brave cavalry dare charge them. This makes them a target for missile attacks, so they are outfitted in leather armour and carry large shields to protect themselves from the expected rain of arrows.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些戰士裝備雙手斬馬刀，可以讓任何騎兵的衝鋒陷入死戰，然後輕易地解決掉敵人。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. Armed with the two-handed zhanmadao, these warriors can bring any cavalry charge to a brutal standstill and make short work of their foes afterwards.
MappedByText: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些戰士裝備雙手斬馬刀，可以讓任何騎兵的衝鋒陷入死戰，然後輕易地解決掉敵人。

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些士兵身著重甲，戰馬同樣披著馬甲，他們是西涼最强的戰士。雖然行動緩慢，但當他們沖進敵人陣型，踐踏和刺殺敵人時，幾乎沒有人能抵抗他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These warriors, clad in heavy armor and riding equally armoured steeds, are the best the Xiliang have to offer. Though slow in maneuvers, almost none can oppose them as they charge into enemy ranks, trampling and goring their enemies on their spears.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些弩手是反騎兵專家。即使是强大的遊牧鐵騎也會避開他們。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These crossbowmen are anti-cavalry specialists. Even the powerful nomadic cataphracts shun them.
MappedByText: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些弩手是反騎兵專家。即使是强大的遊牧鐵騎也會避開他們。

Text: 如果只有力量才能統治，那麼就必須經常充分地展現這樣的力量。必須用那些不信的傻瓜們來罰一儆百。\\n\\n這些經過西涼訓練的戰士，是董卓與呂布强加於漢朝的鐵腕統治的中堅力量。\\n\\n他們弓劍嫻熟，經常上街巡邏，平息騷亂。
English: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make an example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Skilled with both the bow and the sword, they habitually patrol the streets to put down any unrest.

Text: 一邊是長城的陰影，另一邊是草原各部落，西涼民族必須紀律嚴明，艱苦奮鬥。而西涼士兵則必須加倍做到。\\n\\n每一支軍隊都有自己的精銳，西涼精銳則尤其出色。\\n\\n這些矛兵身穿鐵甲，手持巨盾，將守住任何軍隊的前線並擊退敵兵。
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These spearmen, clad in iron armor and wielding great shields, will hold the frontline of any army and drive the enemy back.

Text: 這群憂國憂民之士自稱正道使者，用自身錢財購買護甲與兵器。每人都進行過各種訓練，能熟練使用長戟，並透過傳統的弓箭比試來學習箭術。 \\n\\n 他們雖身穿昂貴服飾，志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄。他們的箭術與戟法皆不容忽視，這樣的靈活多變對戰事有極大助益，也因此受到黃巾軍的熱烈歡迎，一同為太平而戰。
English: These concerned citizens call themselves the Bringers of Righteousness and have used their wealth to purchase their own armour and weapons. Each has undertaken extensive training to become proficient using polearms and learned how to use a bow through traditional archery competitions. \\n\\n Though they wear expensive tunics, their commitment is not mere vainglory; their not-inconsiderable skill with the bow and polearm make them extremely useful due to their flexibility, and therefore welcomed to join the fight for the Great Peace.
Iascus: 這群憂國憂民之士自稱正道使者，用自身錢財購買護甲與兵器。每人都進行過各種訓練，能熟練使用長戟，並透過傳統的弓箭比試來學習箭術。 \\n\\n 他們雖身穿昂貴服飾，志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄。他們的箭術與戟法皆不容忽視，這樣的靈活多變對戰事有極大助益，也因此受到黃巾軍的熱烈歡迎，一同為太平而戰。
Vanilla: 這群憂國憂民之士自稱正道使者，用自身錢財購買護甲與兵器。每人都進行過各種訓練，能熟練使用長戟，並透過傳統的弓箭比試來學習箭術。 \\n\\n 他們雖身穿昂貴服飾，志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄。他們的箭術與戟法皆不容忽視，這樣的靈活多變對戰事有極大助益，也因此受到黃巾軍的熱烈歡迎，一同為太平而戰。
Procrastinator: 這些百姓自稱布義軍，他們自費購進裝甲與武器。他們飽經訓練，能熟練地使用戟，也在傳統的射術比試中習得了弓術。\\n\\n雖然他們衣着光鮮，但志向卻絕非虛榮賣弄，他們靈活矯健，使弓和戟的本事不容小覷，此等義士若能加入太平大業，定是再好不過。

Text: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。
English: A captain and the guards commanding the army instead of the general.
OverrideByKey: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。
Iascus: 由校尉和衛官來指揮軍隊。
Procrastinator: 身經百戰，他們利用經驗指揮所屬部曲劈荊斬棘。

Text: 黃巾軍志士個個不怕衝鋒陷陣，但是護民勇士尤其適合固守陣線，要是挪作他用可就浪費了他們一身的本領和熱忱。\\n\\n他們身披重甲，也許不若其他鐵甲兵士防禦周全，但可仰賴手中大斧抵擋敵軍、化解攻勢。正所謂甲冑可破，鬥志不渝。
English: Whilst all Yellow Turban warriors are happy to wade into the heart of battle, the Gallants of the People were made to hold the frontline against enemies - to be anywhere else would be to waste their talent and ardour. \\n\\n They are heavily-armoured, though not as heavily plated as some other warriors, yet with great axe they are able to push back the advancing foe whilst deflecting blows. Where their mail may falter, their fanaticism never will.
MappedByText: 黃巾軍志士個個不怕衝鋒陷陣，但是護民勇士尤其適合固守陣線，要是挪作他用可就浪費了他們一身的本領和熱忱。\\n\\n他們身披重甲，也許不若其他鐵甲兵士防禦周全，但可仰賴手中大斧抵擋敵軍、化解攻勢。正所謂甲冑可破，鬥志不渝。

Text: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們不善於近戰，所以只用一些撿來的連弩支援前綫部隊。
English: The role of these troops can be deduced from their appearance; their armour pieces are mismatched, put together by collecting those left in the aftermath of battle, or sourced from nearby villages. \\n\\n Their most important function is to search and collect loot, weapons and armour after the battle to put towards the Great Peace. They are not good at close combat, so they use a bunch of captured repeating crossbows to support frontline.
MappedByText: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們不善於近戰，所以只用一些撿來的連弩支援前綫部隊。
Iascus: 這群士兵的作用能從外表窺知一二：他們的護甲並非成套，而是收集戰後遺留的部件或附近村莊之物拼湊而成。 \\n\\n 他們最大的用處便是在戰鬥結束後收集戰利品、武器和護甲，以便在成就太平之路上添磚加瓦。他們會帶著長槍和盾來自保，有時也可上陣充數，但他們幾乎毫無武藝可言，而且容易潰逃。
Procrastinator: 從這些部隊的外觀就不難推測他們是幹什麼的，他們的盔甲要麼是從戰場上拾撿拼湊而來，要麼是從周圍村落裏搞來的。\\n\\n他們最重要的作用是在戰後蒐集戰利品、武器以及盔甲，從而推進太平大業。他們配有長矛和盾牌用以自衛，有時會被拉去充數，但是基本沒什麼打仗的本事，稍有交兵便作鳥獸散。

Text: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n這些騎兵是黃巾軍中僅有的突擊騎兵。一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。
English: To be the bolt of justice, to spearhead a charge deep into the enemy lines, delivering vengeance for an oppressed people, this is the task of these warriors. \\n\\n These cavalry are one of the few shock cavalry of the Yellow Turbans army.; once they have ploughed into an enemy formation with their spears, they have the armour and the skill to keep fighting, thrusting with enough force to pierce most armour with righteous intensity.
MappedByText: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n這些騎兵是黃巾軍中僅有的突擊騎兵。一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。
Iascus: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n儘管以突擊騎兵而言這支先鋒部隊的戰力不算上乘，但他們以韌性見長，一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。
Vanilla: 替天行道，衝鋒陷陣，為民除害，是彼使命。\\n\\n儘管以突擊騎兵而言這支先鋒部隊的戰力不算上乘，但他們以韌性見長，一旦執槍闖入敵陣，便能憑著良甲和武藝持續奮戰，哪怕是頑石般的盔甲也難以抵擋他們灌注義憤的一擊。
Procrastinator: 這些勇士的使命便是替天行道，爲蒼生而戰，給與敵人致命一擊。\\n\\n 儘管他們並非最強大的衝鋒騎兵，但他們在耐力上卻更勝一籌。他們不但能手持長槍，用衝鋒撕裂敵人的陣型，還身披重甲，能夠在近戰中堅持奮戰，用正義的怒火刺穿敵人的鎧甲。

Text: 在道家的中心思想裡，敬重土地、滋養土地，則土地必將恩澤人民。承蒙天地滋養的勇士，有責任運用這份恩賜懲奸除惡，平定四方。\\n\\n這些戰士拾柴造箭、削木做弓，箭法遠超常人。
English: It is a central tenet of Taoism that the land must be revered and nurtured; it, in turn, will return to us its bounties. Those chosen warriors who receive of nature's boons must use its gifts to pursue those who have contributed to the corruption and destruction plaguing the land. \\n\\n From the boughs of the trees, arrows and crossbows are fashioned and handled by warriors who wield them with greater expertise than most of their contemporaries.
Iascus: 在道家的中心思想裡，敬重土地、滋養土地，則土地必將恩澤人民。承蒙天地滋養的勇士，有責任運用這份恩賜懲奸除惡，平定四方。\\n\\n這些戰士拾柴造箭、削木做弓，箭法遠超常人。
Vanilla: 在道家的中心思想裡，敬重土地、滋養土地，則土地必將恩澤人民。承蒙天地滋養的勇士，有責任運用這份恩賜懲奸除惡，平定四方。\\n\\n這些戰士拾柴造箭、削木做弓，箭法遠超常人。
Procrastinator: 道教的核心思想之一便是敬天愛民，如此方能使天下大治。那些得到上天眷顧的將士們必須將貪官污吏盡數誅滅，纔可稱之爲不辱使命。\\n\\n這些戰士們手持木製的弓箭，有着超凡脫俗的精湛弓術。

Text: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持鋒利的長槍向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion challenges the corruption that poisons China and has made many question old loyalties. \\n\\n These noblemen have renounced their former warlords to seek justice and redemption. Their previous life of privilege has trained and equipped them well, and they ride into battle clad in ornate armour and helmets upon impressive mounts of the finest stock. \\n\\n With sharp spears, the impact of their charge is merely a way to break the enemy’s lines for deadly close combat.
MappedByText: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持鋒利的長槍向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。
Iascus: 黃巾軍起義，劍指危害天下的腐敗，並讓許多人對心中舊有的忠誠觀念產生疑問。 \\n\\n 這些名門賢士拋棄了原先效忠的諸侯，轉而尋求公義，彌補自己的罪過。他們因先前的優渥生活而受過紮實的訓練，並擁有精良的裝備。賢士穿戴華美的護甲與頭盔，騎著威風凜凜的良駒駿馬踏上戰場。 \\n\\n 他們手持斧頭、舉起盾牌向前衝鋒，只為突破陣線，與敵軍來場你死我活的近戰廝殺。
Procrastinator: 黃巾軍衝擊了天下的腐朽勢力，許多人都開始有所動搖。\\n\\n這些貴族不再效忠於之前的諸侯，而是另尋天義以求救贖。他們之前生活優渥，自然裝備訓練充足，他們身着華麗兜鍪騎良馬殺入戰場，他們手持斧頭和盾牌，衝破敵陣後也會近戰砍殺。

Text: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執爆裂物著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。
English: Where the militia of the Han are pressed into service out of obligation, the Yellow Turban zealots rise to fight because it is the only way to carve a better future for the people. \\n\\n Their fierce determination makes them more effective than standard militia. They charge into battle, lightly-armoured and equipped with explosive materials, ready to rend asunder any who doubt or question the Way.
MappedByText: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執爆裂物著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。
Iascus: 漢軍民兵是被迫服役效勞朝廷，黃巾信眾則是為了扶助天下萬民而挺身奮戰。\\n\\n他們堅守職志，比起一般民兵更加善戰。這些信眾執大刀著輕甲趕赴沙場，欲將質疑太平道的敵人全數斬除。
Procrastinator: 漢代的民兵往往是被迫服役的，但黃巾戰士們確實真心實意爲天下蒼生而戰。\\n\\n 這種堅決的意志使他們比一般的民兵更爲勇猛。他們身着輕甲，手持闊劍，毫不留情地斬殺一切與黃天爲敵之人。

Text: 未完成\\n\\n（請於MTU的Discord裏TROM頻道提出建議）

Text: 袁氏的聲望帶來了許多好處，其中之一是有很多人願意為他們效命。揮舞著高貴的劍刃，手持堅固的盾牌，身著優質的盔甲，這些劍士將滿懷熱情地保衛他們的主公。他們組成袁軍戰線的前沿，一直砍殺到敵人或者他們自己倒下。
English: The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.
MappedByText: 袁氏的聲望帶來了許多好處，其中之一是有很多人願意為他們效命。揮舞著高貴的劍刃，手持堅固的盾牌，身著優質的盔甲，這些劍士將滿懷熱情地保衛他們的主公。他們組成袁軍戰線的前沿，一直砍殺到敵人或者他們自己倒下。
Iascus: The Yuan clan's fame brings many benefits, one of which the number of men willing to lay down their lives in their service. \\n\\n Wielding the noble Jian blade, and protected by stout shields and good armour, these swordsmen will defend their masters with zeal. They form the frontline of the Yuan battleline, chopping and slashing at their foe until either they or themselves are slain.

Text: 高聳險奇的群山立於中原南方，與波濤洶湧的海洋相抗衡。在崇山峻嶺之間，越人仍世世代代勉力維生。他們曾有著輝煌的過往，如今則得力抗北方漢人入侵。儘管他們持有劍盾，但還遠不是精兵的敵手。\\n\\n然而在一名立志守護他們理念的奇人率領之下，越民團結一心，喚起自身的古老力量，為傳承而戰！
English: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!
MappedByText: 高聳險奇的群山立於中原南方，與波濤洶湧的海洋相抗衡。在崇山峻嶺之間，越人仍世世代代勉力維生。他們曾有著輝煌的過往，如今則得力抗北方漢人入侵。儘管他們持有劍盾，但還遠不是精兵的敵手。\\n\\n然而在一名立志守護他們理念的奇人率領之下，越民團結一心，喚起自身的古老力量，為傳承而戰！
Iascus: Mighty, gnarled monoliths, the imposing peaks of China's south stand like sentinels against the unrelenting waters beyond. Amongst these hills and peaks, the Yue tribes eke out their continued existence; brought low from the once-proud past, they stand now against the threat of Han invasion from the north. Although they wield sword and shield, they are nothing like the professional warriors coming to face them. \\n\\n Yet, united behind one who purports to fight for their ideals, the Yue are able to summon themselves into something resembling their own strength – their legacy demands it!

Text: 雖然袁术稱帝並不得人心，但幸運的是，亂世之中只要用金錢就可以買到忠誠。當他募集了本地最優秀的戰士，並賦予他們最高的薪餉和最好的裝備，這支部隊亦可算作羽林騎了。\\n\\n他們與主公一樣渴望名聲，寧死也不願接受失敗。
English: Although Yuan Shu is not a popular leader, fortunately, it is an era where money can buy loyalty. When he gathered the best warriors in the region and paid them the highest salaries with best equipments, a plausible royal guards was created. \\n\\n They are as confident as their master's desire for fame, and would rather die than accept failure.
MappedByText: 雖然袁术稱帝並不得人心，但幸運的是，亂世之中只要用金錢就可以買到忠誠。當他募集了本地最優秀的戰士，並賦予他們最高的薪餉和最好的裝備，這支部隊亦可算作羽林騎了。\\n\\n他們與主公一樣渴望名聲，寧死也不願接受失敗。

Text: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。
English: What kind of men are these, who are not soldiers, yet wear elite armour? Bloody men, who have earned their weaponry through victory and pillaging.
MappedByText: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。
Iascus: 這些人并非軍士，卻穿著精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。
Procrastinator: 這些人並非軍士，卻穿着精良的鎧甲。他們的裝備來自於血腥的勝利和洗劫。

Text: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。
English: As the enemy spots the blue turbans on the field, they know the hardest fighting is about to begin.
MappedByText: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。
Iascus: 當敵人在戰場上看到藍色頭巾時，他們就知道最艱苦的戰鬥即將開始。
Procrastinator: 當藍色的頭巾出現在戰場上時，最棘手的對手即將來臨。

Text: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。
English: The Han must be restored. These men shall follow their righteous general to the death to see it done.
MappedByText: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。
Iascus: 漢室必須復興。這些人將誓死跟隨他們通曉大義的將軍。
Procrastinator: 我等將追隨左將軍匡扶大漢！

Text: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。
English: Whether near or from afar, these soldiers shall bring justice to any who would threaten their prince.
MappedByText: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。
Iascus: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要為任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。
Procrastinator: 無論遠近，這些士卒都要爲任何威脅他們主公的人討回公道。

Text: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。
English: The Glory of the Han shall endure while these men have the strength to wield their halberds.
MappedByText: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。
Iascus: 只要這些人有力量揮舞他們的戰戟，漢室的榮耀就將延續。
Procrastinator: 手持戰戟，保衛大漢江山。

Text: 身披金甲，這些英勇的騎兵在戰力也如他們的戰甲一般閃耀。
English: A prince's retinue reflects their glory in splendour. These brave cavalrymen match their splendour with equal prowress in battle.
Iascus: A prince's retinue reflects their glory in splendour. These brave cavalrymen match their splendour with equal prowress in battle.
Procrastinator: 身披金甲，這些英勇的騎兵在戰力也如他們的戰甲一般閃耀。

Text: 重裝部隊，携帶張力很强的鐵弓。
English: Heavily-armoured troops carrying iron bows that requires very strong tension.
MappedByText: 重裝部隊，携帶張力很强的鐵弓。
Iascus: 重裝部隊，携帶張力很强的鐵弓。
Procrastinator: 這些重裝弓兵不僅身披鐵甲，且攜帶張力極強的長弓。

Text: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。
English: Armed with bow and sword, these disciplined riders enforce the will of their warlord.
MappedByText: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。
Iascus: 佩戴劍弓，這些紀律嚴明的騎手執行他們主公的意志。
Procrastinator: 遠近皆通，這些佩戴着劍與短弓的騎兵執令如山。

Text: 忠诚於劉備的部隊，結義弟兄手持大刀，情同手足，攻守俱佳，隨主人共同成長。
English: Liu Bei's loyal unit, the Oath Fellows wield glaives and share a strong bond, excelling in both offense and defense as they grow with their lord.
MappedByText: 忠诚於劉備的部隊，結義弟兄手持大刀，情同手足，攻守俱佳，隨主人共同成長。

Text: 這些身經百戰的精銳盜賊兩手各持一斧，率先出陣，攻敵不備。
English: These elite, battle-hardened bandits carry an axe in each hand, and advance ahead of the front lines to catch their foes unawares
Iascus: 這些身經百戰的精銳盜賊兩手各持一斧，率先出陣，攻敵不備。
Vanilla: 這些身經百戰的精銳盜賊兩手各持一斧，率先出陣，攻敵不備。
Procrastinator: 這些身經百戰的精英匪盜雙手各執一斧，可在戰線前方殺敵之出其不意

Text: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。
English: These versatile infantry will solve nigh any problem their Wu commanders might face.
MappedByText: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。
Iascus: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解决吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。
Procrastinator: 這些多能的步兵幾乎可以解決吳軍將領可能面臨的任何問題。

Text: 精通戟術的卓越戟兵，忠心耿耿地為劉表保衛荊州的榮譽。
English: Excellent Ji wielders, these soldiers are loyal to Liu Bao to protect the honor of Jing province.
MappedByText: 精通戟術的卓越戟兵，忠心耿耿地為劉表保衛荊州的榮譽。

Text: 北海的熟練弓手，善於防守陣地，用火矢點燃戰場。
English: Skilled bowmen of Beihai, adept at defensive positions, igniting the battlefield with flames.
MappedByText: 北海的熟練弓手，善於防守陣地，用火矢點燃戰場。

Text: 北海的弩弓守衛，能夠遠距離穿透護甲，通過互相配合來有效防禦敵軍。
English: Beihai's defenders wielding crossbows, capable of piercing armor at range, their coordination boosts their defensive efficacy.
MappedByText: 北海的弩弓守衛，能夠遠距離穿透護甲，通過互相配合來有效防禦敵軍。

Text: 北海的精銳騎馬弩手，以迅捷的機動性和火力來增強該地遠程射擊的能力。
English: Elite horse-mounted crossbowmen from Beihai, enhancing the province's ranged warfare with swift mobility and firepower.
MappedByText: 北海的精銳騎馬弩手，以迅捷的機動性和火力來增強該地遠程射擊的能力。

Text: 北海的手持盾牌的手戟步兵，擅長保護遠程單位，專精近身防禦。
English: Beihai's shield-bearing Hand-Ji infantry, experts in protecting ranged units, specializing in close-quarters defense.
MappedByText: 北海的手持盾牌的手戟步兵，擅長保護遠程單位，專精近身防禦。

Text: 北海的快速射手，以連弩發射密集箭雨，在緊密編隊中更準確。
English: Beihai's rapid-fire specialists, using repeating crossbows to unleash continuous volleys, gain accuracy in tight formations.
MappedByText: 北海的快速射手，以連弩發射密集箭雨，在緊密編隊中更準確。

Text: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。
English: Echoing the glory of Chu, the great axes these men wield will make short work of their shielded foes.
MappedByText: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。
Iascus: 這些人所揮的大斧是楚國的榮耀，即使是持盾的敵人亦命不久矣。
Procrastinator: 對於這些斧兵來說，荊楚之威是通過破裂的敵方戰甲來樹立的。

Text: 荊楚矛兵的忠勇對任何軍閥來說都是一筆巨大的財產。
English: Stalwart as the hills they were raised in, these Chu spearmen are an asset to any warlord.
Iascus: 這些楚國的矛兵與山丘一樣堅韌，對任何一個軍閥來說都是一筆財富。
Procrastinator: 荊楚矛兵的忠勇對任何軍閥來說都是一筆巨大的財產。

Text: 在崎嶇的荊楚山丘中，荊州弓手的箭雨堪比天降死神。
English: Raining death from afar, the archers of Jingchu have learned well the advantage that the bow brings in hilly terrain.
Iascus: 荊楚弓手早已領悟到了弓箭在丘陵地帶的優勢。
Procrastinator: 在崎嶇的荊楚山丘中，荊州弓手的箭雨堪比天降死神。

Text: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。
English: Amongst the hills of Jingchu, the unwary may find themselves tripped upon a caltrop, and slain by the man who laid it.
MappedByText: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。
Iascus: 在荊楚的山中，粗心的人可能會被一把蒺藜絆倒，然後被放它的人殺死。
Procrastinator: 在荊楚之地作戰，稍有疏忽就可能落入鉤鐮兵的致命陷阱中。

Text: 家僕弓兵是莊園防禦的關鍵，使用弓箭有效守護領地。
English: House Servant Archers are key to efficient estate defense, using bows to effectively hold and secure territory.
MappedByText: 家僕弓兵是莊園防禦的關鍵，使用弓箭有效守護領地。

Text: 家僕斧兵為士族莊園提供廉價的防禦，以簡單的斧頭控制領地。
English: House Servant Axemen provide cost-effective defense for noble estates, leveraging simple axes for territorial control.
MappedByText: 家僕斧兵為士族莊園提供廉價的防禦，以簡單的斧頭控制領地。

Text: 家僕長槍兵擅長列陣防禦，反制騎兵，手持雙手長矛在戰場上穩固陣腳。
English: House Servant Long Spearmen excel in line defense and anti-cavalry roles, wielding two-handed spears to maintain order on the battlefield.
MappedByText: 家僕長槍兵擅長列陣防禦，反制騎兵，手持雙手長矛在戰場上穩固陣腳。

Text: 士族弓兵，憑藉著世代傳承的箭術，在地方衝突中提供了高效而經濟的支援。
English: Local Noble Archers, adept from tradition, provide valuable, cost-efficient archery support in local skirmishes.
MappedByText: 士族弓兵，憑藉著世代傳承的箭術，在地方衝突中提供了高效而經濟的支援。

Text: 手持雙手長斧的民兵；雖不熟練但力量強大，能夠發動有力的攻擊。
English: Militia armed with two-handed axes; a formidable but unskilled force capable of delivering powerful strikes.
MappedByText: 手持雙手長斧的民兵；雖不熟練但力量強大，能夠發動有力的攻擊。

Text: 惡狼齊聚，黑山匪幫已經準備好去打下屬於自己的江山了。
English: The desperate and the disenfranchised gather at the base of Black Mountain, ready to expand their fortunes or die trying.
Iascus: The desperate and the disenfranchised gather at the base of Black Mountain, ready to expand their fortunes or die trying.
Procrastinator: 惡狼齊聚，黑山匪幫已經準備好去打下屬於自己的江山了。

Text: 民兵在百戰後其技藝已經可以匹敵朝廷士兵。
English: Having defended their home for long enough, even militia may grow to rival professional soldiers.
Iascus: 長久保衛家園之後，即使是民兵也可能成長為職業士兵的對手。
Procrastinator: 民兵在百戰後其技藝已經可以匹敵朝廷士兵。

English: With club in hand, the desperate shall make a fortune and name for themselves, or die trying.
Iascus: With club in hand, the desperate shall make a fortune and name for themselves, or die trying.

Text: 在江東山林中，藏匿着與大漢不共戴天的亡命之徒。
English: In the hills and mountains of the Southlands, the desperate will lay down their lives to escape the Han.
Iascus: In the hills and mountains of the Southlands, the desperate will lay down their lives to escape the Han.
Procrastinator: 在江東山林中，藏匿着與大漢不共戴天的亡命之徒。

Text: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。
English: Steppe horse archers are in high demand by many warlords. But sometimes they make a better profit by working for themselves.
MappedByText: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。
Iascus: 很多軍閥都想要有草原騎射手。但與其為人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。
Procrastinator: 很多軍閥都想要招募這些善於騎射的遊牧士兵。但與其爲人效命，有時候不如自己單幹。

Text: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。
English: The Yan frontier offers no shortage of good horses. The constant warfare provides these steeds with expert riders.
MappedByText: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。
Iascus: 燕疆不乏良馬。連綿的戰事為這些戰馬提供了老練的騎手。
Procrastinator: 燕國產好馬，頻繁的戰鬥使這些好馬不乏善騎的主人。

Text: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。
English: A charge from a squadron of Spear cavalry is a daunting sight for any soldier. But to see the warriors of Yan descend upon them is a new brand of terror altogether.
MappedByText: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。
Iascus: 對任何一個士兵來説，一隊持槍騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。
Procrastinator: 對任何一個士兵來說，一隊持矛騎兵的衝鋒都會令人生畏。但如果殺來的是燕國戰士，則是一種全新的恐怖。

Text: 這些弩兵躲在盾后射箭。
English: These are the crossbowmen who shoot while hiding with shields.
MappedByText: 這些弩兵躲在盾后射箭。

Text: 智慧以及巧藝能使最普通的民兵成爲令人生畏的殺手。
English: Ingenuity and craftsmanship can turn even a lowly militiaman into a daunting foe.
Iascus: Ingenuity and craftsmanship can turn even a lowly militiaman into a daunting foe.
Procrastinator: 智慧以及巧藝能使最普通的民兵成爲令人生畏的殺手。

Text: 八才劍衛是劉表的菁英劍士，以無與倫比的刀劍技藝體現著荊州的武風。
English: Liu Bao's elite swordsmen, embodying Jing province's martial spirit with unmatched blade mastery.
MappedByText: 八才劍衛是劉表的菁英劍士，以無與倫比的刀劍技藝體現著荊州的武風。

Text: 神出鬼沒於晨霧中，如黑影一般獵殺其獵物，令人窒息。
English: Great danger hides in the early mist of day. Phantoms that will maim their prey, or whose choking gass leaves them gasping for air.
Iascus: Great danger hides in the early mist of day. Phantoms that will maim their prey, or whose choking gass leaves them gasping for air.
Procrastinator: 神出鬼沒於晨霧中，如黑影一般獵殺其獵物，令人窒息。

Text: 箭上塗抹的劇毒能使死神在戰後依然找上門來。
English: The sting of an arrowshaft can be deadly, but with these archers, death may still find you long after the arrow pierced your flesh.
Iascus: The sting of an arrowshaft can be deadly, but with these archers, death may still find you long after the arrow pierced your flesh.
Procrastinator: 箭上塗抹的劇毒能使死神在戰後依然找上門來。

Text: 士燮培訓的武僧是耐力過人的防禦單位，手持禪杖，受佛教原則啟發。他們的堅韌使他們能夠有效地抵禦敵人的攻擊。
English: Monk Warriors are durable defensive units trained by Shi Xie, wielding staffs and inspired by Buddhist principles. Their resilience allows them to withstand enemy blows effectively.
MappedByText: 士燮培訓的武僧是耐力過人的防禦單位，手持禪杖，受佛教原則啟發。他們的堅韌使他們能夠有效地抵禦敵人的攻擊。

Text: 多少軍隊試圖擊潰這些戰士，成功者寥寥無幾。
English: To break these warriors is the challenge of many an army. So far, very few have succeeded.
Iascus: 多少軍隊試圖擊潰這些戰士，成功者寥寥無幾。
Vanilla: 多少軍隊試圖擊潰這些戰士，成功者寥寥無幾。
Procrastinator: 不少人都想擊潰這些戰士，但極少有人成功。

Text: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。
English: Echoing the nomads they fought for years, these horse archers will do the Xiliang army proud on any battlefield.
MappedByText: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。
Iascus: 這些馬弓手與其他遊牧部落征戰多年，在任何戰場上都是西涼軍的驕傲。
Procrastinator: 以彼之道，還施彼身。與遊牧民族的鬥爭中精通了騎射之道，西涼弓騎手可以在任何戰場中爲西涼軍揚名立威。

Text: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。
English: Their bolts remind the foe that even at range, noone is truly safe from the might of the Xiliang army.
MappedByText: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。
Iascus: 他們的弩矢提醒敵人，即使離得很遠，在强大的西涼軍前也不會安全。
Procrastinator: 這些弩兵時刻提醒着敵人即使是在一定距離外，西涼軍的殺氣也無處不在。

Text: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。
English: With Hand-ji and shield, these Xiliang warriors will bring death to the enemy.
MappedByText: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。
Iascus: 佩戴盾與手戟，這些西涼勇士為敵人帶來殺身之禍。
Procrastinator: 手持圓盾與短戟，這些西涼勇士爲敵人帶來殺身之禍。

Text: 這些人熟練地揮舞著戰戟，他們會維護西涼軍可怕的聲譽。
English: Brandishing their Ji expertly, these men will uphold the fearsome reputation of the Xiliang army.
MappedByText: 這些人熟練地揮舞著戰戟，他們會維護西涼軍可怕的聲譽。
Iascus: 這些人熟練地揮舞著戰戟，他們會維護西涼軍可怕的聲譽。
Procrastinator: 這些士卒揮舞着長戟爲西涼軍揚名立萬。

Text: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。
English: Years of fighting the steppe tribes have shaped these Xiliang spear-riders into a deadly force.
MappedByText: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。
Iascus: 草原部落多年的戰鬥已將這些西涼騎兵塑造成了一支致命的力量。
Procrastinator: 與遊牧民族多年的鬥爭使這些持槍的西涼騎兵攻無不克。

Text: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。
English: With sword and shield, these Xiliang horsemen will strike fear into the foe.
MappedByText: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。
Iascus: 佩戴劍盾，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。
Procrastinator: 刀光劍影，這些西涼騎兵令敵軍不寒而慄。

Text: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。
English: No horseman shall pass these spearmen from the famed Xiliang army.
MappedByText: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。
Iascus: 沒有任何騎兵能衝破赫赫有名的西涼軍槍陣。
Procrastinator: 西涼人善騎，自然也清楚騎兵的弱點。

Text: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。
English: Even in the elite Xiliang army, having a big sword can only bring advantages to a commander.
MappedByText: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。
Iascus: 就算在精銳的西涼軍裏，一把大刀對於將領來説也頗有好處。
Procrastinator: 任何精銳軍隊中都不乏有長劍兵的身影，西涼軍也不例外。

Text: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。
English: The pride of the Xiliang army, these armored horsemen will teach their enemy the meaning of “elite cavalry”.
MappedByText: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。
Iascus: 作爲西涼軍的驕傲，這些重甲騎兵將教導他們的敵人“精銳騎兵”的含義。
Procrastinator: 遇強則強，這些西涼鐵騎將樹立精銳鐵騎的標準。

Text: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。
English: Their shots are almost always accurate even in the sand breeze.
MappedByText: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。
Iascus: 即使在沙塵中，他們也總能準確命中。
Procrastinator: 即使是沙塵暴也絲毫不會影響這些弩兵的殺敵效率。

Text: 佩戴劍弓，這些硬朗的士兵執行他們主公的意志。
English: Armed with bow and sword, these hardy soldiers enforce the will of their warlord.
MappedByText: 佩戴劍弓，這些硬朗的士兵執行他們主公的意志。
Iascus: 佩戴劍弓，這些硬朗的士兵執行他們主公的意志。
Procrastinator: 遠近皆通，這些佩戴着劍與短弓的步兵執令如山。

Text: 這些精銳矛兵是百經錘煉的西涼戰士，會堅守陣地對抗所有來敵。
English: Hardened Xiliang soldies, these elite spearmen will hold the line against all comers.
MappedByText: 這些精銳矛兵是百經錘煉的西涼戰士，會堅守陣地對抗所有來敵。
Iascus: 這些精銳矛兵是百經錘煉的西涼戰士，會堅守陣地對抗所有來敵。
Procrastinator: 都說西涼兵久經沙場，今見這些精銳矛兵，果然是不動如山，抗線殺敵。

Text: 技藝高超的步兵，配有長兵器和弓。戰鬥技巧多變且頗具威力，遠程與近戰皆宜。
English: Skilled militia armed with polearms and bows, a flexible and effective unit for combat both close and from afar.
Iascus: 技藝高超的步兵，配有長兵器和弓。戰鬥技巧多變且頗具威力，遠程與近戰皆宜。
Vanilla: 技藝高超的步兵，配有長兵器和弓。戰鬥技巧多變且頗具威力，遠程與近戰皆宜。
Procrastinator: 裝備了戟和弓箭的民間義士，對於近身作戰和遠程滋擾都很擅長
負責領導以及指揮其所屬部曲。

Text: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。
English: Bravery drives a warrior to battle more effectively than any general; a great axe keeps them there.
MappedByText: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。
Iascus: 勇氣是最好的將領，能帶領士兵踏上沙場。良斧在手，則能讓士兵在沙場存活。
Procrastinator: 自身的勇氣能鼓舞士兵踏上沙場，而一把良斧則能讓士兵在沙場存活。

Text: 這支步兵負責收集在戰場上遺落的兵甲，協助同袍再戰。
English: This infantry gathers equipment dropped or left behind in battle to help their brothers and sisters continue the fight.
Iascus: 這支步兵負責收集在戰場上遺落的兵甲，協助同袍再戰。
Vanilla: 這支步兵負責收集在戰場上遺落的兵甲，協助同袍再戰。
Procrastinator: 這些步兵從戰鬥中收集掉落的裝備，從而幫助同袍們繼續奮勇殺敵。

Text: 他們手執長槍一馬當先，發出正義戰吼直搗敵軍！
English: At the head of charge they draw their spears, driving home with a righteous cry!
Iascus: 他們手執長槍一馬當先，發出正義戰吼直搗敵軍！
Vanilla: 他們手執長槍一馬當先，發出正義戰吼直搗敵軍！
Procrastinator: 衝鋒的士兵們握緊了長矛，發出正義的怒吼！

Text: 護育水土、救亡天下，此乃地傑軍之夙願。
English: Nature must be preserved and the world saved. These warriors will see it done.
Iascus: 護育水土、救亡天下，此乃地傑軍之夙願。
Vanilla: 護育水土、救亡天下，此乃地傑軍之夙願。
Procrastinator: 這些戰士的信念便是拯救天下蒼生，他們將爲此奮戰到底。

Text: 精銳騎兵護衛，將兵器指向昔日主君，改為黃巾軍效力。
English: Elite cavalry guards who have turned their weapons against their former masters to serve the Yellow Turbans.
Iascus: 精銳騎兵護衛，將兵器指向昔日主君，改為黃巾軍效力。
Vanilla: 精銳騎兵護衛，將兵器指向昔日主君，改為黃巾軍效力。
Procrastinator: 背棄前任主公轉投黃巾大業的精英騎兵

Text: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。
English: Their own lives are not important, and they will somehow stop the enemy.
MappedByText: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。
Iascus: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。
Procrastinator: 不顧己命也要阻擋敵人。

Text: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。
English: An illustrious lineage provides many swords, along with men willing to wield them.
MappedByText: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。
Iascus: 顯赫的血統可以使許多劍士願意效命。
Procrastinator: 袁氏善於用劍，其部下軍士自然也是如此。

Text: 南方山間的陡峭山崖將百姓磨練成目光如電的戰士。
English: The cragged edges of the southern mountains fashion peasants into warriors, flint-eyed and sharp.
Iascus: 南方山間的陡峭山崖將百姓磨練成目光如電的戰士。
Vanilla: 南方山間的陡峭山崖將百姓磨練成目光如電的戰士。
Procrastinator: 江南險峻陡立的羣峯將山民鍛鍊成了勇猛精幹的戰士。

Text: 北海重甲弩兵，配合部曲能提供增強的遠程支援。
English: Heavily armored crossbowmen of Beihai, capable of delivering enhanced ranged support in coordination with Buqu units.
MappedByText: 北海重甲弩兵，配合部曲能提供增強的遠程支援。

Text: 北海精銳近戰勇士，手持雙手鐵錘，威力驚人，身披重甲，適合近身格鬥。
English: Elite melee warriors of Beihai, wielding two-handed maces with devastating effect, clad in heavy armor for close combat.
MappedByText: 北海精銳近戰勇士，手持雙手鐵錘，威力驚人，身披重甲，適合近身格鬥。

Text: 熟練的擲鋋兵，無視南蠻地形的懲罰，擅長反制騎兵與象兵。
English: Skilled javelineers immune to Nanman's terrain penalty, specializing in anti-cavalry and elephant tactics.
MappedByText: 熟練的擲鋋兵，無視南蠻地形的懲罰，擅長反制騎兵與象兵。

Text: 靈活的劫匪，手持軍刀和火焰彈，擅長製造混亂，無視南蠻地形的懲罰。
English: Versatile raiders armed with sabers and flame shots, adept at causing chaos and immune to Nanman's terrain challenges.
MappedByText: 靈活的劫匪，手持軍刀和火焰彈，擅長製造混亂，無視南蠻地形的懲罰。

Text: 士燮貿易路線的精銳護衛，手持長戟和弓箭，在南蠻苛刻地形下行走如履平地。
English: Elite guards of Shi Xie's trade routes, wielding halberds and bows, with immunity to Nanman's terrain penalty.
MappedByText: 士燮貿易路線的精銳護衛，手持長戟和弓箭，在南蠻苛刻地形下行走如履平地。

Text: [[b]]衝鋒抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n決定該部隊能承受多大程度的敵軍衝鋒。此作用於該單位被衝鋒時。
English: [[b]]CHARGE RESISTANCE[[/b]]\\n\\n Determines how solidly this unit can withstand enemy charges. Only functions when the unit is braced.
MappedByText: [[b]]衝鋒抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n決定該部隊能承受多大程度的敵軍衝鋒。此作用於該單位被衝鋒時。
Iascus: [[b]]衝鋒抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n決定該部隊能承受多大程度的敵軍衝鋒。此作用於該單位被衝鋒時。
Procrastinator: [[b]]衝鋒抵抗力[[/b]]\\n\\n決定該部隊能承受多大程度的敵軍衝鋒。此僅作用於該單位被衝鋒時。
PikaMan: [[b]]衝鋒抵抗力[[/b]]\n\n決定該部隊能承受多大程度的敵軍衝鋒。此作用於該單位被衝鋒時。

Text: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。
English: [[b]]ARMOUR[[/b]]\\n\\n Decreases standard melee, ranged and explosion damages. Doesn't help against armour-piercing damage.
MappedByText: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。
Iascus: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n 減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。
Procrastinator: [[b]]護甲[[/b]]\\n\\n減少單位受到的標準近戰傷害、遠程傷害以及爆炸傷害。無法防禦穿甲傷害。

Text: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。
English: [[b]]BONUS VS. CAVALRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against cavalry.
MappedByText: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。
Iascus: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。
Procrastinator: [[b]]對抗騎兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高對騎兵的近戰傷害。

Text: [[b]]對抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對步兵的近戰傷害。
English: [[b]]BONUS VS. INFANTRY[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases melee damage against infantry.
MappedByText: [[b]]對抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對步兵的近戰傷害。
Iascus: [[b]]對抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 提高對步兵的近戰傷害。
Procrastinator: [[b]]對抗步兵加成[[/b]]\\n\\n提高對步兵的近戰傷害。

Text: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 通過降低敵人的近戰回避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。
English: [[b]]MELEE HIT BONUS[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases a unit's hit chance at all times by decreasing the enemy's melee evasion.
MappedByText: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 通過降低敵人的近戰回避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。
Iascus: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n 通過降低敵人的近戰回避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。
Procrastinator: [[b]]近戰命中加成[[/b]]\\n\\n通過降低敵人的近戰迴避，增加單位在任何時候的命中率。

Text: [[b]]近戰迴避[[/b]]\\n\\n 此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。
English: [[b]]MELEE EVASION[[/b]]\\n\\n Increases the chance of evading melee damage from front and side. The enemy's charge bonus decreases it.
MappedByText: [[b]]近戰迴避[[/b]]\\n\\n 此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。
Iascus: [[b]]近戰迴避[[/b]]\\n\\n 此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。
Procrastinator: [[b]]近戰閃避[[/b]]\\n\\n此能力值會提高閃避正面與側面近戰傷害的機率。敵人的衝鋒加成會降低此能力值。
